ygData.subject: Re: Off Topic: King Ak'anon
ygData.msgSnippet: say you guys judge for yourself, seems like a minature human monk to me, kinda odd, maybe he is a magician or something.
ygData.messageBody:
say you guys judge for yourself,
seems like a minature human monk to me, kinda odd, maybe he is a magician
or something.



At 01:34 AM 6/20/99 -0400, Xenophile wrote:
>From: "Xenophile" <xenophile@...>
>
>Just curious but does the king look like a default male human to anyone
>else?
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Kevin Runde <krunde@...>
>To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
>Sent: Wednesday, June 16, 1999 7:21 PM
>Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Off Topic: King Ak'anon
>
>
>> From: Kevin Runde <krunde@...>
>>
>> Yeah I have not had a responce either. From the looks of it he is a big
>time
>> tinker though!
>>
>> "D. Richard Moss" wrote:
>>
>> > From: "D. Richard Moss" <rmoss@...>
>> >
>> > Hehe, ya I was surprised when I found him too. I tried talking to him,
>but
>> > it seemed like he didn't have much to say at the time.
>> >
>> > Zilligan
>> > ----- Original Message -----
>> > From: Kevin Runde <krunde@...>
>> > To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
>> > Sent: Tuesday, June 15, 1999 9:18 PM
>> > Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Off Topic: King Ak'anon
>> >
>> > > From: Kevin Runde <krunde@...>
>> > >
>> > > Yes, I have seen him. You won't believe who it is either! =) I have
>not
>> > been
>> > > able to talk to him yet, but a lot of quest raise your faction with
>him so
>> > I
>> > > bet if you do enough quest he will talk to you.
>> > >
>> > > -Kevin
>> > >
>> > > Zach Heaven wrote:
>> > >
>> > > > From: Zach Heaven <zheaven@...>
>> > > >
>> > > > Off topic here, no need to reply, just delete. I'm
>> > > > sending it to Tinkering because it's Gnome specific.
>> > > >
>> > > > In Ak'anon, if you're heading towards the warriors
>> > > > guild, but hitch a left and go out over the water into
>> > > > the spires that hold a few shops you'll occasionally
>> > > > notice something:
>> > > >
>> > > > King Ak'anon begins to cast a spell.
>> > > >
>> > > > Has anyone SEEN the King? I can't find him. And I
>> > > > wonder if you COULD talk to him, if he would send you
>> > > > on some really wild quests.
>> > > >
>> > > > Please make sure I'm not smoking crack on this one,
>> > > > because I SWEAR I receive that message when I'm out
>> > > > over the water on those shops.
>> > > >
>> >
